ValidationRule.description: No user allowed to update Services Request Status field except Jesse Meredith, Petra Haltmayer, Kevin Ehrie
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = '01250000000caCy', /*RFP Request*/ $User.Id <> '00550000005hzhl', /*Kevin Ehrie*/ $User.Id <> '00550000005XsLJ', /*Petra Haltmayer */ $User.Id <> '005500000016XB9', /*Jesse Meredith*/ OR( ISCHANGED(Services_Request_Status__c), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Services_Request_Status__c, "Submitted")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Services Request Status field is not editable. Please contact Professional Services Sales if you believe this value should be updated.
